variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects.

Subject consented to Alzheimer disease research conducted by non-profit and for-profit (pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies) organizations. Consented to genetic research of any human diseases conducted by non-profit and for-profit (pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies) organizations (GRU - General Research Use)
Subject consented to Alzheimer disease research and genetic research of any human disease at non-profit organizations only (NPU - Non-Profit Organization Use)
Subject consented to Alzheimer disease research only at non-profit and for-profit (pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies) organizations (Alz_only - Alzheimer Only)
Consented to Alzheimer disease research only at non-profit organizations (Alz_NPU - Alzheimer_Non-Profit Organization Use)

variable.name: SOURCE
variable.value: the National Cell Repository for Alzheimer's Disease

variable.name: SubjectID
variable.comment: De-identified ID, unique subject ID for dbGaP
